jam.sort.stream
Class L002InputStream

java.lang.Object
  jam.sort.stream.EventInputStream
      jam.sort.stream.L002InputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
L002Parameters
public class L002InputStream
extends EventInputStream
implements L002Parameters

This class knows how to handle Oak Ridge tape format. It extends EventInputStream, adding methods for reading events and returning them as int arrays which the sorter can handle.

Since:
JDK1.1
Version:
0.5 April 98
Author:
Dale Visser, Ken Swartz
See Also:
EventInputStream

Method Detail

readEvent

public EventInputStatus readEvent(int[] input)
                           throws EventException
Reads an event from the input stream Expects the stream position to be the beginning of an event. It is up to the user to ensure this.

Specified by:
readEvent in class EventInputStream
Parameters:
input - container for the event info read from the event stream
Returns:
an indicator of the status after the read from the event stream
Throws:
EventException - thrown for errors in the event stream
See Also:
EventInputStatus

readHeader

public boolean readHeader()
                   throws EventException
Read in the header Format of ORNL LOO2 data Implemented EventInputStream abstract method.

Specified by:
readHeader in class EventInputStream
Returns:
true if OK, false if there was a problem
Throws:
EventException - thrown for unrecoverable errors
